title: Federico Bertoia
text: I am a first-year PhD student in Statistics at Ghent University under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Stijn Vansteelandt. My research lies at the intersection of causal inference and debiased machine learning. If you want to get in touch, please don’t hesitate to contact me.

title: Federico Bertoia

title: About me
